channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025020056
item.description:
Report X-2025020056

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-05T03:26:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-17
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 1/17/2025 at approximately 0945, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp facility in Anchorage, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of 2 fiberboard boxes, each containing 201 boxes of safety matches. The shipment was x-rayed and identified by Customs. It appears that the shipment was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations, as it seems to have shipped without the required markings, labeling, packaging or paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an investigation by the FAA.
